aiPrompt.base: I am applying for financial support.

aiPrompt.employmentCircumstances: Help me describe my employment circumstances, including why I am unemployed or underemployed.
aiPrompt.reasonForApplying: Help me explain why I need this financial assistance and how it will help improve my situation.

samplePrompts.currentFinancialSituation: Example: I currently have no income due to job loss. My savings of $500 are nearly depleted. I have monthly expenses of $1,500 including rent, utilities, and food. I have accumulated $3,000 in credit card debt trying to cover basic necessities.
samplePrompts.employmentCircumstances: Example: I was laid off from my full-time position as a retail manager two months ago when the store closed. Despite applying to over 30 positions, I have only had two interviews. The job market in my field is highly competitive.
samplePrompts.reasonForApplying: Example: I am applying for this financial support to cover my rent and basic necessities for the next month while I continue my job search. This assistance will prevent homelessness and allow me to maintain a stable address and phone for potential employers to contact me.
